flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: No wires, no batteries, just a swipe of your phone. If you don't have time to plug in a charger, just swipe your phone and it's fully charged. Why wait for a plug in charger, when you can swipe your phone over this and it's fully charged
guide.title: mobile portable wireless battery charger
